attributes.description: The Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio 2.9 V6 engine generates 375 kW and produces 600Nm of torque between 2500 and 5000 rev/min. This engine is extraordinarily powerful yet extremely lightweight, made entirely out of aluminium. The engine is combined with a 8-speed automatic transmission that allows you to changes gears in only 150 milliseconds in Race mode. The gearbox can be controlled via the aluminium paddle shifters on the steering wheel in addition to to the leather wrapped shifter in the center console.
